## Validators.min() method

Creates validator function that validates control if its value is lower than min value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static min(min: number | null): ValidatorFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  min | <code>number &#124; null</code> | Min value that should be validated |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ValidatorFn`
